alert.note: Alert for Panola; Quitman; Tallahatchie (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 6:02PM CDT until September 06 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Tallahatchie County in northwestern Mississippi... Quitman County in northwestern Mississippi... Southwestern Panola County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 601 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lambert, or 14 miles east of Clarksdale, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marks, Lambert, Crowder, Curtis Station, Belen, West Marks, Mims, Barksdale, Denton, Riverview, Longstreet, Asa, Hinchcliff, Sabino, Locke Station, Essex and Chapeltown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
